the short hair that grows on a man's face if he has not shaved (= cut the hair) for a few days: With the back of his hand, he rubbed the stubble on his chin.
/GettyImages
the short stems left after a crop such as wheat has been cut: In the distance, a wisp of smoke rose from burning stubble.
